mapper.sql: plan_id, truck_type, is_finish, plan_number, plan_volume, good_volume, remain_volume, bad_volume, plan_date, produce_date, finish_date, check, remark
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from truck_plan
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into truck_plan (plan_id, truck_type, is_finish, plan_number, plan_volume, good_volume, remain_volume, bad_volume, plan_date, produce_date, finish_date, check, remark) values (#{planId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{truckType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isFinish,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{planNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planVolume,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodVolume,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remainVolume,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{badVolume,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{planDate,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{produceDate,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{finishDate,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{check,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
